^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MaxSpeedMbps.description: This is the maximum speed in Mbps of this interface.
MaxSpeedMbps.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the nominal link speed of the interface in Mbps.

Provider.description: The provider of this EthernetInterface. This can either be a Port of a ComputerSystem or a PCIeFunction.
Provider.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the ComputerSystem or PCIeFunction schema.

title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_EthernetInterface.v1_0_0
